definitions.body: :Ps 7:17 violence, wrong—abs. ´[[ח]] Ge 6:11+ 44 t.; cstr. [[חֲמַס]] Ju Jdg 9:24 + 7 t.; sf. [[חֲמָסִי]] Ge 16:5, Je 51:35 (in both = wrong done to me); [[חֲמָסוֹ]] Ps 7:17; pl. [[חֲמָסִים]] 2Sa 22:49 + 3 t.;—violence, specif. of physical violence Ju Jdg 9:24, 2Sa 22:3 (not ‖ Ps 18:3), Ob:Ob 10, Hb Hab 1:9, Je 51:35 (of Chaldeans), Hb Hab 2:8, Hab 2:17, Hab 2:17, Joe 4:19, Ps 72:14; but also wrong, incl. injurious language, harsh treatment, etc. Ge 16:5 (J, of wrong done to Sarah by, Hagar), Job 19:7; Mal 2:16; in gen. of rude wickedness of men, their noisy, wild, ruthlessness Mic 6:12, Hb Hab 1:2, Zep 1:9, Pr 10:6, Pr 10:11, Pr 13:2, Pr 26:6 + Ez Eze 7:11 (si vera l., v. Co), ‖[[שׁׂד]] Am 3:10, Hb Hab 1:3, Je 6:7, Je 20:8, Ez Eze 45:9, Is 60:18, ‖[[רִיב]] Ps 55:10, ‖[[עָמָל]] Ps 7:17, ‖[[גַּאֲיׇה]] Ps 73:6, ´[[אׂהֵב ח]] Ps 11:5 (‖[[רָשָׁע]]), denied, of servant of ´[[י]] Is 53:9, [[בארץ]] ´[[ח]] Je 51:46, cf. Ge 6:11, Ge 6:13 (P), Ez Eze 8:17, Eze 12:19; [[מָֽלְאוּ]] ´[[מַחֲשַׁכֵּי־אֶרֶץ נְאוֹת ח]] Ps 74:20, ´[[הָעִיר מָֽלְאָה ח]] Ez Eze 7:23, Eze 28:16, ´[[שֶׁבֶת ח]] Am 6:3 is (prob.) enthronement of violence; ´[[כְּלֵי ח]] Ge 49:5 (poem) instrument, weapons, of violence;—other phrases are: [[בְּיׇדַיִם]] ´[[ח]] Jon 3:8, 1Ch 12:17, cf. Job 16:17, [[יְדֵיכֶם]] ´[[ח]] Ps 58:3 and [[בְּכַפֵּיהֶם]] ´[[פּׂעַל ח]] Is 59:6; ´[[עֵד ח]] i.e. a witness that promotes violence and wrong Ex 23:l (JE), De 19:16, ´[[עֵדֵי ח]] Ps 35:11; [[עֵדֵי שֶׁקֶר]] [[וִיפֵהַ חָמָס]] Ps 27:12; ´[[שׂנאת ח]] Ps 25:19 = hatred characterized by violence; [[אִישׁ חָמָס]] = violent man Ps 18:49 (2Sa 22:49 has the later [[חמסים]] ´[[א]], cf. infr.) Ps 140:12, Pr 3:31, Pr 16:29; [[אישׁ חמסים]] (later) Ps 140:2, Ps 140:5, 2Sa 22:49; [[יֵין חֲמָסִים]] Pr 4:17 i.e. wine gained by violence (‖[[לֶחֶם רֶשַׁע]]).
